channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Trees are damaged, 11th April
item.description:
On the green in Meadoway located in front of 98, there has been a report of residents damaging the blossom trees by hanging off branches which has caused branches to break.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Meadoway, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedge overgrown, 11th April
item.description:
Private garden hedge encroach ing onto prow. Had to duck down low to walk through!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Close, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A number of holes from a failing repair. Made worse by being under the railway bridge so as a cyclist you cannot see them., 11th April
item.description:
Directly before and also under the railway bridge on the side heading towards Gotherington from Prescott.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous or intimidating animals problem, 11th April
item.description:
Email received 10/04/2025 - copy attached. Customer reports ongoing issues with vermin at the location and requests that this is addressed.
Report on FixMyStreet
